item.description:
It's the end of summer (fall begins Sept 22nd). Join us for a potluck picnic to welcome new members and say goodbye to summer.

We have many new members who have joined this year, but not all have had a chance to come out to an event. We hope many of you new members will come out to meet & greet. Of course this event is open to all members.


This event is free - we only ask that you bring a potluck dish, drink or snack. Show off your cooking skills and bring a dish to share. If you can't cook or don't have time, then please buy something to bring.

Tme: 1pm - 5pm

We have rented a picnic tables 8, 9 & 10. These tables and grills are near the covered picnic area & water fountain. We also have one grill available. Please bring a lawn chair or picnic blanket. We will set up a badminton net, VB net and there are tennis courts at the park as well. The weather looks good for saturday. We hope to see you there.

Rides - if you need a ride or can provide a ride, please indicate the town and/or T stop you are coming from. Our members are good about offering carpools.


When you RSVP, please indicate the dish you will be bringing so we won't duplicate food items.


Things you may want to bring:

fresh spring rolls
sandwiches
salad
pasta salad
potato salad
fish ball kabobs
asian noodles
fried rice
sticky rice
chicken wings
dogs
sausage
fruits


We will also provide utensils, plates and some drinks.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck Picnic - Saturday, 1pm - 5pm
